notes.text:
would replace trance for a 2nd escape from darkness if i had 1 more copy. lp boost a has proven many uses in both card of soul and survivabilty (strong survivability)

30 card deck = variety in starting hand which of course equals more options and of course less clog with cards like card of soul. grass mills has never been disappointing.

Empress might not be needed at all as well. the idea was to work around sea stealth but that almost felt impossible to accomplish with ease. shes mainly discard fodder; also replaceable. necrofears are essentials and skill succesor is just teched.

econ is 100% not necesarry. didnt like it at all in earlier builds. remember to use calvary archfiend in conjunction with normal trap. 3 Calvary is essential.
